short_desc: A Survival Zombie kill game of survival points with 2 types of zombies
long_desc: Are you brave enough to face the undead? Jump into a zombie apocalypse where survival is everything. Dodge, aim, and rack up points as two types of zombies chase you down. Every second counts in this electric survival thriller!

short_desc: An interactive game where players guess the meaning of emojis. Built with React for seamless gameplay.
long_desc: Think you're fluent in emoji? Test your skills in this fun-filled emoji guessing game. Powered by React, it's smooth, quick, and more expressive than words! Perfect for all ages.

short_desc: An interactive tool to create custom memes by adding text to images. Allows downloading or sharing memes directly.
long_desc: Power up your creativity! Upload, type, and generate hilarious memes with ease. Share your custom memes in seconds â€“ because even gas & electric stores deserve a good laugh.

short_desc: A card matching game designed to improve memory skills. Fully responsive with a fun interface.
long_desc: Flip, remember, and win! This card-matching game is designed to energize your brain and improve your memory skills. Colorful, responsive, and super addictive!

short_desc: A game that simulates tossing a coin. Tracks the number of heads and tails for an engaging experience.
long_desc: Heads or Tails? Predict and win! A simple yet addictive coin-toss simulator that keeps track of your lucky streaks. Realistic flip animations and responsive design make it a quick thrill anytime.

short_desc: An interactive game to play rock-paper-scissors against a computer. Built with React for a smooth user experience.
long_desc: Play against the computer in this retro favorite! Fast-paced and smartly built with React, challenge your reflexes and strategy in this timeless showdown.
